title: The Dark Secret Behind Taylor Swift's Private Jet

media:group.media:title: The Dark Secret Behind Taylor Swift's Private Jet
media:group.media:description:
Get with the times, Taylor. Or better yet, get with the future of aviation on CuriosityStream https://www.curiositystream.com/simonclark

You can support the channel and help me make more videos like this one by becoming a patron at http://www.patreon.com/simonoxfphys

This is a silly little video talking about why Taylor Swift using her private jet isn't the end of the world, but the fact that we're talking about it is a little worrying. Our individual actions on climate are not meaningful, but the system they take place in is - and that's what we should be discussing. The fact that we think of our carbon footprints has a quite interesting history that makes me break out the tin foil.

References in this video:
1. https://weareyard.com/insights/worst-celebrity-private-jet-co2-emission-offenders
2. https://www.rollingstone.com/music/music-news/kylies-17-minute-flight-has-nothing-on-the-170-trips-taylor-swifts-private-jets-took-this-year-1390083/
3. https://ec.europa.eu/commission/presscorner/detail/en/MEMO_06_218
4. https://ourworldindata.org/grapher/annual-co-emissions-by-region?time=1990..latest
5.https://www.eea.europa.eu/themes/climate/eu-greenhouse-gas-inventory
6. https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-politics-62221444
7. https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-021-02847-2

Video essay about Taylor Swift and her private jet, how many flights did Taylor Swift take this year, Taylor Swift caused climate change. Why is everyone talking about Taylor Swift and her private jet? How did Swifties react?
